methods.name: isStartDragOk
methods.comment: Return true if the dragUserData can be dragged.

params.name: dragUserData
params.comment: data where user is initiating the drag operation

params.name: dragAction
params.comment: user action for the drag operation

methods.name: getSupportedDragActions
methods.comment:
Returns the supported Drag actions for this tree.  For available actions see
 DnDConstants.

methods.name: isDropSiteOk
methods.comment: Return true if the drop site is valid for the given target.

methods.name: drop
methods.comment: Add the given transferable's data to the destination user data.

params.name: transferable
params.comment: the transferable being dragged whose data will be dropped.
